summary: An ordinance relating to the municipal water supply system; providing for the acquisition by condemnation of certain property and property rights in unplatted portions of Sections 15, 16 and 21, of Township 23 North, Range 5 East, W. M., Sections 7, 8, 9, 16, 18, 21, 28, 33 and 34 of Township 24 North, Range 5 East, W. M., C. D. Hillman's Lake Washington Garden of Eden, Division Nos. 6 and 8, and the Plat of Mercer for a pipeline right of way to supply Mercer Island and vicinity, and repealing Ordinance No. 84259.
